attributes.action: Re home ex serviceman before immigrants. Help them find work.
attributes.additional_details: It is so often being reported that our ex serviceman have no place to live & get hardly any help when leaving the armed forces. Our government needs to sort this problem out before sending so much money abroad & giving immigrants housing.
attributes.background: There are too many ex serviceman needing help finding a home & employment. The government put foreigners before our own people who have served this country. Our own people must be given priority before immigrants.
